name: Great British Golf: Middle Ages: 1940
overview: Great British Golf: Middle Ages - 1940 is an encyclopedia about Golf in Britain from 1457 to 1940. It comes with two games: a trivia and an animated golf game. The encyclopedia part features 92 auditory and visual articles, the quiz features 500 multiple choice questions with added audio and visuals. All questions can be answered through carefully studying the encyclopedic part. The golf game lets you play at the Old Course in St Andrews using historical figures and equipment. 70 of the 92 digital articles and most of the menu structure was taken directly from the British Golf Museum in Scotland. Additional articles were photographed from three dimensional displays in the museum.
